feature_bullets: Efficace filtrazione: utilizzando la tecnologia di filtraggio della brocca dell'acqua a 7 stadi, la caraffa filtrante Waterdrop Chubby prova l'acqua per eliminare al minimo il minimo. Riduce metalli pesanti come arsenico, piombo e altri contaminanti come fluoruro, cloro, nonch√© qualsiasi odore e sapore. Offre acqua pi√π sana e dal sapore migliore (testato da un terzo laboratorio).

Qualit√† eccezionale: il prodotto √® realizzato in plastica senza BPA di alta qualit√†, con un semplice ma rigido manico in legno naturale, che facilita la manipolazione dell'attrezzatura. Utilizzando carbone attivo caricato in argento e ACF altamente efficiente dal Giappone per il filtro della caraffa d'acqua, si garantisce prestazioni ottimali.

Lunga durata con garanzia senza rischi: i filtri di alta qualit√† producono oltre 200 litri di acqua prima della sostituzione. Inoltre, una caraffa filtrante Waterdrop Chubby sostituisce oltre 1600 bottiglie di acqua standard. Questa brocca viene fornita con una garanzia di 90 giorni, garanzia di qualit√† e pronta consegna.

Indicatore intelligente: il nostro design intelligente garantisce una vita pi√π sana e senza problemi per gli utenti, in quanto √® possibile monitorare la qualit√† dell'acqua in qualsiasi momento. Grazie all'indicatore intelligente sostituibile che rileva quando l'acqua viene versata, ora √® possibile vedere lo stato di utilizzo dell'elemento filtro in base alla modalit√† di visualizzazione del LED (diodo di emissione di luce) in tempo reale.

Design innovativo: la caraffa filtrante Waterdrop Chubby permette al filtro dell'acqua di essere perfettamente posizionato sulla maggior parte delle porte del frigorifero, il design innovativo del coperchio del beccuccio pu√≤ aiutare a evitare che polvere e altre particelle entrino nella brocca. √à molto facile ricaricare la brocca, in quanto non √® nemmeno necessario rimuovere il coperchio.

top_reviews.title: Great tasting and clean water! Worth it!
top_reviews.body: Really a great water filter. It does what it is supposed and it is much better than Britta. Price is also amazing and super competitive. Easy to clean. I got a white colour and I have to say I should probably go with the clear version because at the moment I am just guessing how much water is left to filter. However, filtering process is super fast.  In overall a great and effective product. Only downside or negative is that you really need to use both hands to pour filtered water into a glass. The lid isn‚Äôt locked and it tend to fell out. So you always need to pour water with one hand and secure/hold with other one.Leggi di pi√π
top_reviews.body_html:
Really a great water filter. It does what it is supposed and it is much better than Britta. Price is also amazing and super competitive. Easy to clean. I got a white colour and I have to say I should probably go with the clear version because at the moment I am just guessing how much water is left to filter. However, filtering process is super fast.

In overall a great and effective product. Only downside or negative is that you really need to use both hands to pour filtered water into a glass. The lid isn‚Äôt locked and it tend to fell out. So you always need to pour water with one hand and secure/hold with other one.
Leggi di pi√π

date.raw: Recensito nel Regno Unito il 3 novembre 2023

top_reviews.title: Great value and design
top_reviews.body: I absolutely love this water filter. I had a glass one I owned for 20 years and broke the other day so went on a wf search and how times have changed. This is a great price. BPA free. Lovely design. Holds a lot of water. Filters much quicker than my old filter due to better cartridge design and the lid is really well designed with a filter expired indicator so clever for a great price in these straitened times. I was so upset myvfilter broke and now so glad as I can see it was passed its best and I needed an upgrade. Highly recommendedLeggi di pi√π
top_reviews.body_html:
I absolutely love this water filter. I had a glass one I owned for 20 years and broke the other day so went on a wf search and how times have changed. This is a great price. BPA free. Lovely design. Holds a lot of water. Filters much quicker than my old filter due to better cartridge design and the lid is really well designed with a filter expired indicator so clever for a great price in these straitened times. I was so upset myvfilter broke and now so glad as I can see it was passed its best and I needed an upgrade. Highly recommended

top_reviews.title: Incre√≠ble
top_reviews.body: Sin duda la mejor jarra filtradora que hemos tenido nunca. Antes tuvimos Brita y BWT y con esta nos hemos sorprendido por el buen sabor de agua que deja, al menos en Valencia donde el agua del grifo es bastante clorada y calc√°rea y por ende su sabor resulta bastante desagradable. Filtra de forma muy r√°pida y ademas los cartuchos duran much√≠simo m√°s que las anteriores que hemos tenido. De momento estamos muy contentos con su uso, nos hemos evitado el estar subiendo garrafas de agua y por supuesto el pl√°stico generado. Muy recomendable a√∫n pareciendo m√°s caras que las otras.Leggi di pi√π

Sin duda la mejor jarra filtradora que hemos tenido nunca. Filtra de forma muy r√°pida y ademas los cartuchos duran much√≠simo m√°s que las anteriores que hemos tenido. De momento estamos muy contentos con su uso, nos hemos evitado el estar subiendo garrafas de agua y por supuesto el pl√°stico generado. Muy recomendable a√∫n pareciendo m√°s caras que las otras.

top_reviews.title: Practical and Good taste
top_reviews.body: Its large capacity is very practical as I use it for both drinking and making coffee. It has a solid, sturdy structure. There is a little opening on the top of the jug for filling it up so you don't have to remove the lid. And most importantly, the water tastes great. All in all, I am very satisfied.Leggi di pi√π
top_reviews.body_html:
Its large capacity is very practical as I use it for both drinking and making coffee.
It has a solid, sturdy structure.
There is a little opening on the top of the jug for filling it up so you don't have to remove the lid.
And most importantly, the water tastes great.
All in all, I am very satisfied.
Leggi di pi√π
